name: Spot The Dot
description:
This is a little game where you have to react quickly to break objects. Some objects are harder than other and require multiple clicks to break. Other objects should not be clicked at all.
This game really tests you reaction time and concentration as these objects eventually get spawned at an incredible rate.

Key Features

  • A click fest spanning 30 levels.
  • Completed levels are saved automatically, with the option to replay levels to increase high score.
  • Uplifting and upbeat sound track.
  • Objects are spawned at random locations, allowing from replayability.
  • Includes 3 survival levels.
